description:
Free Windows Memory Optimization Toolo

Wise Memory Optimizer is the best free Windows memory optimization tool. It helps you free up and tune up the physical memory taken up by some useless applications to enhance PC performance. Wise Memory Optimizer, as automatic and intelligent as other products from WiseCleaner.com, can execute its tasks in accordance with your settings and the physical truth of your computer. It is really easy to use for both novices and experts alike. 100% free of charge, able to optimize memory automatically in the background, able to free up as much memory as possible Inserted a real-time dynamic chart to show your memory status. Supports of Windows 11, Windows 10, Windows 8.1/8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, and Windows XP.
